 ) } export const DynamicFlexGap = () => { const [gap, setGap] = useState('md') return ( <> Gap Sizes: ) } # Flex Component The `Flex` component provides a flexible and powerful way to manage layouts in your React applications. With a rich set of variants and customization options, it allows you to easily control the direction, alignment, and spacing of child elements. ## Installation Ensure that have the @zyxui library installed in your project: ```bash npm install @zyxui/flex ``` If you haven't install and setup @zyxui before please follow the [`installation guide`](/docs/installation) ## Basic Usage Import the `Flex` component and use it to create flexible layouts:
01
02
03
04
 ```tsx showLineNumbers import Flex from '@zyxui/flex' const FlexExample = () => { return (
01
02
03
04
 ) } export default FlexExample ``` ## Customization Tailor the behavior of the `Flex` component to suit your layout needs with the following customization options. ### Direction The `direction` prop allows you to control the direction of `flex` container. This porp can have many values: `column` | `column-reverse` | `row` | `row-reverse`, and the default value is: `row`. ```tsx showLineNumbers {18} import Flex from '@zyxui/flex' import Text from '@zyxui/text' import Button from '@zyxui/button' import { useState } from 'react' export const DynamicFlexDirection = () => { const [direction, setDirection] = useState('row') return ( Change Direction Value:
01
02
03
04
05
 ) } ``` ### Justify The `justify` prop, allows you to align items along the `main axis`. You can check all about this prop values in [API Reference Section](#api-reference) justify: flex-start 01 02 03
justify: center 01 02 03
justify: flex-end 01 02 03
justify: space-between 01 02 03
justify: space-around 01 02 03
justify: space-evenly 01 02 03
justify: stretch 01 02 03
justify: normal 01 02 03 ```tsx showLineNumbers {7, 14, 21, 28, 35, 42, 49, 56} import Flex from '@zyxui/flex' import Text from '@zyxui/text' const FlexJustifyPropExample = () => { return ( Justify Center Example 01 02 03
Justify Center Example 01 02 03
Justify End Example 01 02 03
Justify Space Between Example 01 02 03
Justify Space Around Example 01 02 03
Justify Space Evenly Example 01 02 03
Justify Stretch Example 01 02 03
Justify Normal Example 01 02 03 ) } export default FlexJustifyPropExample ``` ### Align The `align` prop, allows you to align items along the `corss axis`. You can check all about this prop values in [API Reference Section](#api-reference) Align Start Example 01 02 03
Align Stretch Example 01 02 03
Align End Example 01 02 03
Align Center Example 01 02 03
Align Baseline Example 01 02 03 ```tsx showLineNumbers {7, 14, 21, 28, 35} import Text from '@zyxui/text' import Flex from '@zyxui/flex' const FlexAlignPropExamples = () => { return( Align Start Example 01 02 03
Align Stretch Example 01 02 03
Align End Example 01 02 03
Align Center Example 01 02 03
Align Baseline Example 01 02 03 ) } export default FlexAlignPropExamples ``` ### Wrap With `wrap` prop, you are able to control wether the flex container should wrap it's children or not. Values that should be provided to this prop: `wrap` | `wrap-reverse` | `nowrap`, and the default value is 'nowrap'. wrap: nowrap Directions:

 ) } export default WrapPropExamples ``` ### Gap The `gap` prop, allows you to adjust the gap between child elements. Accepted values for this prop are: `sm` | `md` | `lg` | `xl` | `undefined/null` ```tsx showLineNumbers {21} import Button from '@zyxui/button'; import Text from '@zyxui/text'; import Flex from '@zyxui/flex'; import { useState } from 'react'; const DynamicFlexGap = () => { const [gap, setGap] = useState('md') return ( <> Gap Sizes: ) } export default DynamicFlexGap; ``` ## API Reference The `Flex` component exposes a range of customization options to tailor the behavior of your layout. Here's an overview of the available props: | Property | Description | Type | Default | | --------------------|-------------------------------------------|-------------|-------------| | direction | Control the direction of the flex container. | reference `flex-direction` | `row` | | justify | Align items along the main axis. | reference `justify-content` | `flex-start` | | align | Align items along the cross axis. | reference `align-items` | `stretch` | | wrap | Control whether the flex container should wrap its children. | reference `flex-wrap` | `nowrap` | | gap | Adjust the gap between child elements. | `sm` \| `md` \| `lg` \| `xl` \| `none` | `none` | | className | Adding custom class names to your text element. | `string` | `undefined` |

`,(0,r.jsxs)(l,{children:[(0,r.jsx)(o,{children:(0,r.jsx)(Xa,{})}),(0,r.jsxs)(e.div,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-fragment":"",children:[(0,r.jsx)(e.pre,{className:"vitesse-light",style:{backgroundColor:"#ffffff"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"tsx","data-theme":"light",raw:`import Flex from '@zyxui/flex'
import Text from '@zyxui/text'
import Button from '@zyxui/button'
import { useState } from 'react'


export const DynamicFlexDirection = () => {
    const [direction, setDirection] = useState('row')
    return (
        <Flex direction='column' gap='lg'>
            <Flex gap='sm'>
                <Text as='span'>Change Direction Value:</Text>
                <Button size='sm' variant={direction === 'row' ? 'flat' : null} onPress={() => {setDirection('row')}}>row</Button>
                <Button size='sm' variant={direction === 'row-reverse' ? 'flat' : null} onPress={() => {setDirection('row-reverse')}}>row-reverse</Button>
                <Button size='sm' variant={direction === 'column' ? 'flat' : null} onPress={() => {setDirection('column')}}>column</Button>
                <Button size='sm' variant={direction === 'column-reverse' ? 'flat' : null} onPress={() => {setDirection('column-reverse')}}>column-reverse</Button>
            </Flex>
            <Flex direction={direction} gap='md'>
                <div className='bg-pink-800 px-10 py-2'>01</div>
                <div className='bg-pink-800 px-10 py-2'>02</div>
                <div className='bg-pink-800 px-10 py-2'>03</div>
                <div className='bg-pink-800 px-10 py-2'>04</div>
                <div className='bg-pink-800 px-10 py-2'>05</div>
            </Flex>
        </Flex>
    )
}

import Text from '@zyxui/text'
import Button from '@zyxui/button'
import { useState } from 'react'


export const DynamicFlexDirection = () => {
    const [direction, setDirection] = useState('row')
    return (
        <Flex direction='column' gap='lg'>
            <Flex gap='sm'>
                <Text as='span'>Change Direction Value:</Text>
                <Button size='sm' variant={direction === 'row' ? 'flat' : null} onPress={() => {setDirection('row')}}>row</Button>
                <Button size='sm' variant={direction === 'row-reverse' ? 'flat' : null} onPress={() => {setDirection('row-reverse')}}>row-reverse</Button>
                <Button size='sm' variant={direction === 'column' ? 'flat' : null} onPress={() => {setDirection('column')}}>column</Button>
                <Button size='sm' variant={direction === 'column-reverse' ? 'flat' : null} onPress={() => {setDirection('column-reverse')}}>column-reverse</Button>
            </Flex>
            <Flex direction={direction} gap='md'>
                <div className='bg-pink-800 px-10 py-2'>01</div>
                <div className='bg-pink-800 px-10 py-2'>02</div>
                <div className='bg-pink-800 px-10 py-2'>03</div>
                <div className='bg-pink-800 px-10 py-2'>04</div>
                <div className='bg-pink-800 px-10 py-2'>05</div>
            </Flex>
        </Flex>
    )
}

Flex from '@zyxui/flex'
import Text from '@zyxui/text'

const FlexJustifyPropExample = () => {
    return (
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Justify Center Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} justify='flex-start'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Justify Center Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} justify='center'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Justify End Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} justify='flex-end'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Justify Space Between Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} justify='space-between'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Justify Space Around Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} justify='space-around'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Justify Space Evenly Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} justify='space-evenly'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Justify Stretch Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} justify='stretch'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Justify Normal Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} justify='normal'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
    )
}

export default FlexJustifyPropExample

import Text from '@zyxui/text'

const FlexJustifyPropExample = () => {
    return (
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Justify Center Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} justify='flex-start'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Justify Center Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} justify='center'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Justify End Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} justify='flex-end'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Justify Space Between Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} justify='space-between'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Justify Space Around Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} justify='space-around'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Justify Space Evenly Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} justify='space-evenly'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Justify Stretch Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} justify='stretch'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Justify Normal Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} justify='normal'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-16 h-16 rounded-md bg-pink-500'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
    )
}

Text from '@zyxui/text'
import Flex from '@zyxui/flex'

const FlexAlignPropExamples = () => {
    return(
        <Text as={'h4'}>Align Start Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} align='flex-start'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-4'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-12'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-8'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Align Stretch Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} align='stretch'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-4'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-12'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-8'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Align End Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} align='flex-end'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-4'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-12'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-8'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Align Center Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} align='center'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-4'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-12'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-8'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Align Baseline Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} align='baseline'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 pt-2 pb-6'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 pt-8 pb-12'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 pt-12 pb-4'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
    )
}

export default FlexAlignPropExamples

import Flex from '@zyxui/flex'

const FlexAlignPropExamples = () => {
    return(
        <Text as={'h4'}>Align Start Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} align='flex-start'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-4'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-12'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-8'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Align Stretch Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} align='stretch'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-4'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-12'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-8'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Align End Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} align='flex-end'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-4'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-12'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-8'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Align Center Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} align='center'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-4'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-12'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 py-8'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
        <hr className='my-4' />
        <Text className='mb-5 mt-10' as={'h4'}>Align Baseline Example</Text>
        <Flex gap={'sm'} align='baseline'>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 pt-2 pb-6'>01</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 pt-8 pb-12'>02</Flex>
            <Flex justify='center' align='center' className='w-72 rounded-md bg-amber-700 pt-12 pb-4'>03</Flex>
        </Flex>
    )

Text from '@zyxui/text'
import Flex from '@zyxui/flex'

const WrapPropExamples = () => {
    return(
        <>
            <Text as={'h4'}>wrap: nowrap</Text>
            <Flex direction='column' className='mb-5'>
                <Text as={'p'}>Directions:</Text>
                <Flex gap='md' wrap='nowrap' className='bg-cyan-400/10 overflow-hidden border border-cyan-300'>
                    <div className='text-sm flex-none p-4 w-2/5 bg-cyan-700'>Content 01</div>
                    <div className='text-sm flex-none p-4 w-2/5 bg-cyan-700'>Content 02</div>
                    <div className='text-sm flex-none p-4 w-2/5 bg-cyan-700'>Content 03</div>
                </Flex>
            </Flex>
            <Text as={'h4'}>wrap: wrap</Text>
            <Flex direction='column' className='mb-5'>
                <Text as={'p'}>Directions:</Text>
                <Flex gap='md' wrap='wrap' className='bg-cyan-400/10 border border-cyan-300'>
                    <div className='text-sm flex-none p-4 w-2/5 bg-cyan-700'>Content 01</div>
                    <div className='text-sm flex-none p-4 w-2/5 bg-cyan-700'>Content 02</div>
                    <div className='text-sm flex-none p-4 w-2/5 bg-cyan-700'>Content 03</div>
                </Flex>
            </Flex>
            <Text as={'h4'}>wrap: wrap-reverse</Text>
            <Flex direction='column' className='mb-5'>
                <Text as={'p'}>Directions:</Text>
                <Flex gap='md' wrap='wrap-reverse' className='bg-cyan-400/10 border border-cyan-300'>
                    <div className='text-sm flex-none p-4 w-2/5 bg-cyan-700'>Content 01</div>
                    <div className='text-sm flex-none p-4 w-2/5 bg-cyan-700'>Content 02</div>
                    <div className='text-sm flex-none p-4 w-2/5 bg-cyan-700'>Content 03</div>
                </Flex>
            </Flex>
        </>
    )
}

export default WrapPropExamples

import Flex from '@zyxui/flex'

const WrapPropExamples = () => {
    return(
        <>
            <Text as={'h4'}>wrap: nowrap</Text>
            <Flex direction='column' className='mb-5'>
                <Text as={'p'}>Directions:</Text>
                <Flex gap='md' wrap='nowrap' className='bg-cyan-400/10 overflow-hidden border border-cyan-300'>
                    <div className='text-sm flex-none p-4 w-2/5 bg-cyan-700'>Content 01</div>
                    <div className='text-sm flex-none p-4 w-2/5 bg-cyan-700'>Content 02</div>
                    <div className='text-sm flex-none p-4 w-2/5 bg-cyan-700'>Content 03</div>
                </Flex>
            </Flex>
            <Text as={'h4'}>wrap: wrap</Text>
            <Flex direction='column' className='mb-5'>
                <Text as={'p'}>Directions:</Text>
                <Flex gap='md' wrap='wrap' className='bg-cyan-400/10 border border-cyan-300'>
                    <div className='text-sm flex-none p-4 w-2/5 bg-cyan-700'>Content 01</div>
                    <div className='text-sm flex-none p-4 w-2/5 bg-cyan-700'>Content 02</div>
                    <div className='text-sm flex-none p-4 w-2/5 bg-cyan-700'>Content 03</div>
                </Flex>
            </Flex>
            <Text as={'h4'}>wrap: wrap-reverse</Text>
            <Flex direction='column' className='mb-5'>
                <Text as={'p'}>Directions:</Text>
                <Flex gap='md' wrap='wrap-reverse' className='bg-cyan-400/10 border border-cyan-300'>
                    <div className='text-sm flex-none p-4 w-2/5 bg-cyan-700'>Content 01</div>
                    <div className='text-sm flex-none p-4 w-2/5 bg-cyan-700'>Content 02</div>
                    <div className='text-sm flex-none p-4 w-2/5 bg-cyan-700'>Content 03</div>
                </Flex>
            </Flex>
        </>
    )
}

export default WrapPropExamples

`,(0,r.jsxs)(l,{children:[(0,r.jsx)(o,{children:(0,r.jsx)(Ja,{})}),(0,r.jsxs)(e.div,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-fragment":"",children:[(0,r.jsx)(e.pre,{className:"vitesse-light",style:{backgroundColor:"#ffffff"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"tsx","data-theme":"light",raw:`import Button from '@zyxui/button';
import Text from '@zyxui/text';
import Flex from '@zyxui/flex';
import { useState } from 'react';

const DynamicFlexGap = () => {
    const [gap, setGap] = useState('md')

    return (
        <>
            <Flex direction='column' className='mb-5'>
                <Text as={'p'}>Gap Sizes:</Text>
                <Flex gap='md'>
                    <Button size={'sm'} variant={!gap ? 'solid' : 'flat'} onPress={() => setGap(undefined)}>None</Button>
                    <Button size={'sm'} variant={gap === 'sm' ? 'solid' : 'flat'} onPress={() => setGap('sm')}>sm</Button>
                    <Button size={'sm'} variant={gap === 'md' ? 'solid' : 'flat'} onPress={() => setGap('md')}>md</Button>
                    <Button size={'sm'} variant={gap === 'lg' ? 'solid' : 'flat'} onPress={() => setGap('lg')}>lg</Button>
                    <Button size={'sm'} variant={gap === 'xl' ? 'solid' : 'flat'} onPress={() => setGap('xl')}>xl</Button>
                </Flex>
            </Flex>
            <Flex gap={gap}>
                <Button>Button</Button>
                <Button>Button</Button>
                <Button>Button</Button>
                <Button>Button</Button>
                <Button>Button</Button>
                <Button>Button</Button>
            </Flex>
        </>
    )

import Text from '@zyxui/text';
import Flex from '@zyxui/flex';
import { useState } from 'react';

const DynamicFlexGap = () => {
    const [gap, setGap] = useState('md')

    return (
        <>
            <Flex direction='column' className='mb-5'>
                <Text as={'p'}>Gap Sizes:</Text>
                <Flex gap='md'>
                    <Button size={'sm'} variant={!gap ? 'solid' : 'flat'} onPress={() => setGap(undefined)}>None</Button>
                    <Button size={'sm'} variant={gap === 'sm' ? 'solid' : 'flat'} onPress={() => setGap('sm')}>sm</Button>
                    <Button size={'sm'} variant={gap === 'md' ? 'solid' : 'flat'} onPress={() => setGap('md')}>md</Button>
                    <Button size={'sm'} variant={gap === 'lg' ? 'solid' : 'flat'} onPress={() => setGap('lg')}>lg</Button>
                    <Button size={'sm'} variant={gap === 'xl' ? 'solid' : 'flat'} onPress={() => setGap('xl')}>xl</Button>
                </Flex>
            </Flex>
            <Flex gap={gap}>
                <Button>Button</Button>
                <Button>Button</Button>
                <Button>Button</Button>
                <Button>Button</Button>
                <Button>Button</Button>
                <Button>Button</Button>
            </Flex>
        </>
    )
}

export default DynamicFlexGap;
